name: Sus West Shootout
description:
Sus West Shootout is a couple minutes long, one level, two man student project made in Unity. 

Use your revolver, rifle and dynamite to shoot and blast your way through a band of am*ng us characters who have infiltrated and taken control of an old western town. Collect bonuses, find hidden movement boosts and easter eggs, and defeat the boss! But beware of the timer!

This is our first ever game, hope you have some fun! :D

Goal of the game:

  • Your goal is simple. Kill 'em all!

The controls are simple:

  • Move on WASD
  • Shoot with L mouse
  • Jump with Space
  • Switch weapons on 1, 2, 3
  • That's it!

This game has no monetization method and probably won't be updated, but in case there are comments or requests, we might add some things in.

Some things we'd wanted to add:

  • More levels
  • Difficulty options
  • More animations
  • Cutscenes?
  • Some bug fixes

Any feedback would be appreciated, even though the game isn't a serious project!
